snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 444: Knuckles MineHunt (SAGE2009)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Knuckles  MineHunt - SAGE2009
Credit: LarkSS
Release Date: July 25th, 2009

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: Only on Site.

00:00 - Title
00:18 - Attempt 1
03:16 - Attempt 27
06:46 - Attempt 312
09:34 - Attempt 485
15:58 - Attempt 2999
24:36 - Attempt Infinity+

NOTES: Yes, acknowledge the greatness.
That is Minesweeper, I mean Sonic Battle style Knux Mine Hunter!
We now go around digging for explosive Mines for a good 30 mins because "Addiction is a scary thing"
I may have not actually given the game this many Attempts as I joked about but off camera later on I did more anyway.
This game always generates a random board for you to clear sometimes it's so random that you win instantly.
Got a life system you gain one for each 5th Stage, yes great awesome.
Ya start off cool & easy then get reckless to nervous as you make it far into it and make more mistakes yes very nice.
Overall this is LITERALLY Sonic Battle style, Minesweeper! the addiction factor for Mines"Punching" is at an all time HIGH!
If i had to improve it I would give it a larger screen resolution and for each 5th Stage a change of scenery and music.
Otherwise Wohoo! *KaBOOM*
